features: EYEWEAR LANDING ZONE: Rear mechanical hooks on the Oakley DRT5 provide a location to securely stow eyewear while riding or off bike, and allow for unimpeded airflow into the helmet.
BOA 360 FIT SYSTEM: With its soft textile feel and flexibility, the TX1 Lace lies flat against your head, allowing for seamless eyewear compatibility.
SILICONE SWEAT GUARD: Helps to collect and divert sweat away from the eyes, keeping your eyewear streak-free.
ADJUSTABLE VISOR: Features six detents with over 60° of total articulation so riders can easily stow their goggles in the forward facing position.
MIPS INTEGRATION: The MIPS Brain Protection System is a helmet integrated, low friction layer designed to reduce rotational motion to the brain.
